normal.text: {player1}, show the group your screen time. Drink for every hour over 4.
Everyone point to who has the most unread texts right now. That person drinks.
{player1}, open your camera roll. {player2} picks a number 1-30. Show that photo or finish your drink.
If you've ever stalked an ex's new partner, drink. If you're lying, drink double.
{player1}, do your best impression of {player2} trying to flirt. Group rates 1-10, drink the difference from 10.
Last person to show a meme on their phone takes 3 drinks.
{player1}, read your last sent DM out loud. If you refuse, the group picks which app you have to send 'hey' to someone from.
Everyone who's been in a situationship in the last year, drink.
{player1} and {player2}, staring contest. First to laugh drinks. Loser also has to compliment the winner sincerely.
Point to who gives off the most 'main character energy'. They choose: accept the crown and give out 3 drinks, or drink 3 themselves.
{player1}, your dating app bio is now being written by {player2}. Accept it for 24hrs or drink 5.
Waterfall! {player1} starts, everyone drinks until the person before them stops.
Without naming names, {player1} describe your 'type'. Everyone guesses who in the room fits it. Each wrong guess = 1 drink for the guesser.
{player1}, show your Spotify most played. If it's embarrassing, you drink. Group votes.
Rock paper scissors tournament! Everyone pairs up. Losers drink, winners face off until one champion remains.
Categories: {player1} picks a topic (e.g., red flags). Go around naming examples. First to repeat or hesitate drinks.
{player1}, your phone password is now the group's business. Share it or take 4 drinks.
Everyone with an ex's number still saved, drink. If they're saved under a fake name, drink double.
{player1}, you have 30 seconds to make {player2} laugh using only facial expressions. Fail = 3 drinks.
Point to who would survive the longest without their phone. That person hands their phone to someone else for 5 minutes or drinks.
{player1}, what's the most unhinged thing in your notes app? Read it or drink 5.
Everyone who's ever double-texted after being left on read, drink.
{player1}, rank everyone by who you'd want on your zombie apocalypse team. Last pick drinks 3.
Thumb master! {player1} is thumb master. Whenever they put their thumb on the table, everyone must follow. Last person drinks.
{player1} and {player2}, trade phones for 2 minutes. You can look at anything. Or drink 5 each.
Point to who has the worst takes. They must defend their most controversial opinion. If the group disagrees, they drink.
{player1}, text your most recent contact 'I need to tell you something' and show the response. Chicken out = finish your drink.
Never have I ever lied in a never have I ever. Drink if you have. We all know you have.
{player1}, give {player2} your phone. They get to send one text to anyone from your contacts. You can veto for 5 drinks.
Most likely to: wake up in a different city after a night out. That person gives out 3 drinks.
{player1}, do a TikTok dance. If no one recognizes it, everyone else drinks. If they do, you drink.
Everyone who's ordered food just because delivery was free over $15, drink.
{player1}, hot take time. Say something controversial. If anyone agrees, they drink with you.
Floor is lava! Last person with their feet off the ground drinks.
{player1}, scroll your Instagram following and stop randomly. Show who it landed on and explain why you follow them.
Point to who takes the longest to text back. They drink and have to explain themselves.
{player1}, for the next 3 rounds, you can only speak in questions. Break the rule = drink.
Everyone with a finsta, drink. Everyone who follows someone's finsta that doesn't follow theirs, drink again.
{player1}, roast {player2} in 15 seconds. Make it good. If it's weak, you drink.
Compliment battle! {player1} vs {player2}. Take turns complimenting each other. First to break, cringe, or repeat drinks.
Everyone Google yourself. Person with the most embarrassing result drinks.
{player1}, truth or drink: what's the pettiest thing you've done to an ex?
Point to who would be the worst influence. They give out 4 drinks to prove it.
{player1}, your autocomplete challenge: type 'I really want' and send the first suggestion. Show us.
Drink if you've ever pretended to be busy to avoid plans.
{player1}, what's your most played song? If anyone calls it a red flag, drink.
{player1} and {player2}, who can hold a plank longer? Loser finishes their drink.
Everyone who's ever unfollowed someone after an argument, drink.
{player1}, give your best celebrity impression. Everyone guesses. If no one gets it, you drink.
Point to who's most likely to accidentally go viral. They either film a TikTok right now or drink 3.
{player1}, show your search history or drink 5. Clear it first = finish your drink.
Two truths one lie about your dating life. Everyone guesses the lie. Anyone wrong drinks.
{player1}, call your mom and say 'I have news'. Screenshot her response. Worth 3 drinks if you do it.
Everyone stand up. Simon says rules. {player1} is Simon. First to mess up drinks and becomes the new Simon.
Point to the lightweight. They can accept the title or attempt to chug and prove everyone wrong.
{player1}, DM a celebrity and show the group. If you already have a celeb in your DMs, drink 3.
Drink if you've ever unmatched someone for their music taste.
{player1}, rate everyone's vibe 1-10 and explain. Anyone who disagrees with their rating can challenge you to drink.
Who has the most chaotic energy tonight? They control the music for 3 songs or drink.
{player1}, truth or drink: what's your actual body count? (Lying is allowed but karma will find you)
Speed round! Go around saying a word. Theme: things you'd swipe right on. Hesitate or repeat = drink.
Everyone who's ever been the 'crazy' ex, drink. If you don't drink, someone can call you out.
{player1}, show your battery percentage. Drink that many sips divided by 10.
Point to who has the highest standards. They drink unless they can prove they settled.
{player1} vs {player2}: who can say 'unique New York' 5 times fastest? Loser drinks.
Everyone who's lied about being 'almost there' when they haven't left yet, drink.
{player1}, scroll to a random story on your close friends. If someone here isn't on it, explain why.
Confession circle! Everyone admits one thing they've never told the group. Weakest confession drinks.
{player1}, fake propose to {player2}. Sell it. Bad acting = both drink.
Drink if you have a notes app list of people who've wronged you.
{player1}, give your phone to {player2}. They can like any 3 posts on your behalf. Veto = drink 5.
Point to who you'd trust least with a secret. They either share a secret now or drink 3.
{player1}, accent challenge! Speak in a British accent for 2 minutes. Breaking = drink.
Everyone who's ever rage-applied for jobs, drink.
{player1}, create a haiku about {player2} in 30 seconds. Bad haiku = drink.
Point to who would survive longest on a reality dating show. They drink and explain their strategy.
{player1}, show your calculator history. Suspicious math = drink.
Drink if you've ever 'accidentally' opened someone's snap just to see what they sent.
{player1} vs {player2}: freestyle rap battle about each other. 30 seconds each. Loser drinks, group decides.
Everyone with over 500 unread emails, drink. Over 1000 = finish it.
{player1}, what's your most toxic trait? If you can't name one, the group decides and you drink.
New rule from {player1}! Create a rule that lasts 5 rounds. First person to break it drinks.
Everyone who's ever posted and deleted within 10 minutes, drink.
{player1}, let {player2} post one story from your phone. They have full creative control. Refuse = finish drink.
Point to the group therapist. They've heard everyone's problems, now they drink 3.
{player1}, show the group chat you've muted. If someone here is in it, you both drink.
Speed dating round! {player1}, you have 20 seconds to impress {player2}. Cringe = both drink.
Drink if you've ever typed a paragraph then deleted it all and sent 'ok'.
{player1}, give your best motivational speech about {player2}. Under 20 seconds = drink.
Point to who peaked in high school. They defend themselves or drink.
{player1}, show the last TikTok you sent someone. Context matters.
Everyone playing this game sober, drink. Oh wait.
{player1}, truth or drink: who here would you hook up with? (Skip = finish your drink)
Group vote: who's being the most chaotic tonight? They become Question Master until dethroned.
{player1}, open your Amazon order history. Most questionable purchase = 3 drinks.
Drink if you've ever screenshotted a text to send to someone else.
{player1} is in the hot seat! Group asks yes/no questions. Every 'no' = 1 drink. 5 questions max.
Point to who'd win in a fight. They arm wrestle the person who voted least for them.
{player1}, your camera is now {player2}'s. They take 3 photos of you. Post the worst one or drink 4.

sexy.text: {player1}, demonstrate on your hand how you'd kiss someone. Group rates it. Drink the difference from 10.
Point to who you think gives the best relationship advice despite being chronically single. They drink.
{player1} and {player2}, whisper something to each other. The group has to guess if it was a compliment or an insult.
Drink if you've ever texted 'wyd' after midnight with intentions.
{player1}, give {player2} your best pickup line. If it's cringe, you drink. If it works, they drink.
Everyone point to who gives off 'good in bed' energy. That person drinks and tells us nothing.
{player1}, truth or drink: what's your body count? (Ballpark is acceptable)
{player1}, send a flirty text to the last person you matched with. Screenshot or drink 4.
Everyone who's ever sent a 'you up?' text, drink. If it worked, drink again.
{player1}, give {player2} a compliment you'd use on a first date. Make it smooth. Cringe = both drink.
Point to who's most likely to slide into a celebrity's DMs. They show their boldest DM or drink 3.
{player1} and {player2}, maintain eye contact while everyone else tries to make you laugh. First to break drinks.
Drink if you've ever stalked a hookup's Instagram before meeting.
{player1}, describe your worst kiss without naming names. If anyone guesses who, you both drink.
Everyone who's been called 'too intense' by a romantic interest, drink.
{player1}, pick someone to serenade. Sing at least 4 lines. Bail = drink 4.
Point to the best flirt in the room. They have to prove it by flirting with the person to their right.
{player1}, truth or drink: what's the longest you've been in a situationship?
Phone swap chaos! Everyone pass phones to the left. You have 30 seconds to change their wallpaper. No vetos.
{player1} and {player2}, leave the room for 2 minutes. Come back with a secret about each other or both drink 3.
Drink if you've ever caught feelings for a friend with benefits.
{player1}, rank everyone by dateability. Explain your criteria. Anyone offended gets to give you a drink.
Point to who has the highest standards. They have to share 3 dealbreakers.
{player1}, read your last 'I miss you' text out loud. Don't have one? That's also telling. Drink anyway.
Everyone who's ever stalked someone they're dating's ex, drink.
{player1}, bite your lip seductively while maintaining eye contact with {player2}. Both drink if anyone laughs.
{player1} spins an imaginary bottle. Whoever it 'lands on' gets asked a spicy truth or dare.
Drink if you've ever blamed 'being drunk' for something you meant to do sober.
{player1}, share your most embarrassing hookup story. Under 30 seconds = drink for wasting our time.
Point to who you'd set up with a friend. Explain why. If they're offended, drink.
{player1}, let {player2} go through your following list for 30 seconds. They can ask about 3 accounts.
Everyone who's been dumped via text, drink. Bonus drink if it was on a holiday.
{player1}, play a voice memo you've saved. No context needed, just chaos.
Point to who would make the best wingman/wingwoman. They have to actually wing for someone tonight or drink.
{player1}, truth or drink: have you ever pretended to like someone's pet to get closer to them?
Drink if you've ever used someone's Netflix login after breaking up with them.
{player1} and {player2}, hold hands for the next 2 rounds. Either can quit for 2 drinks.
Everyone who's posted a thirst trap, drink. Extra drink if you deleted it.
{player1}, someone here has a crush on you (maybe). Who do you think? Wrong guess = drink.
Point to who you'd swipe right on. Honesty counts, cowardice drinks.
{player1}, show your dating app conversation that went nowhere. Roast yourself.
Drink if you've ever said 'I love you' too early.
{player1}, describe {player2} to a dating app audience in 20 seconds. Bad pitch = drink.
Point to who's caught the most feelings in this room. They drink and deny it.
{player1}, your ex walks in. Who here are you fake dating? They have 30 seconds to play along convincingly.
Everyone who's been ghosted this year, drink. Everyone who's done the ghosting, drink double.
{player1} and {player2}, compare dating app photos. Group votes who's catfishing harder.
Drink if you have someone's hoodie you never returned.
{player1}, give everyone a dating red or green flag. Defend your ratings.
Point to who's the biggest romantic. They plan a dream date in 30 seconds. Boring = drink.
